text: We had a last minute change of destination and all he said was I can make that work.   The bikes were more than trail worthy on the dairy farm trails.   This was a super fun bike excursion that allowed us to see a different side of SG and connect with fellow cyclists.   Great drop off service and solid equipment, highly recommend.

I'm on a work trip in Singapore and wanted to try the local mtb trails. Laurent was super helpful with delivery and pickup. He advised me for the best trails.

Overall 10/10 check this out if you are in the area. Bike is great and well fitted for the local trails
Amazing biking experience in Singapore! Wanted to try something more adventurous and Laurent took me to go mountain biking. Loved it and looking forward to do it again next time I'm in Singapore!

Would give 6/5 stars if I could. The rental was great! We had a small scheduling issue, but were able to sort it out over the phone very easily. The bikes were well kept and practically new. We met Laurent at the MRT station, he gave us some tips on where to go on the island, and then he picked up the bikes from our hotel.  Super easy and great fun!
Great service, great bikes. Made my godson and sonâ€™s dream come true. Highly recommended!
